definitions.definition: the action or an instance of two or more events or things occurring at the same point in time or space.
examples: a conjunction of favorable political and economic circumstances

definitions.definition: an alignment of two planets or other celestial objects so that they appear to be in the same, or nearly the same, place in the sky.
a word used to connect clauses or sentences or to coordinate words in the same clause (e.g., and, but, if ).
